title: The Media Pavilion - Art and Architecture in the Age of Cyberspa
description:
Title:	The Media Pavilion / Der Pavillon der Medien: Art and Architecture in the Age of Cyberspace / Eine neue Gleichung zwischen Kunst und Architektur
Author(s): Helmut Swiczinsky, Wolf D. Prix, Peter Weibel
Publisher: Springer Wien	
Year: 1995	
Language: English
Pages: 96
ISBN:	978-3-211-82722-2, 978-3-7091-9422-5
Size:	14 MB 
Extension: pdf

This book is the first of its kind showing a new equation between art and architecture. Historically the interface between art and architecture was painting and color. Now in the age of cyberspace the new interface are the media, especially the interactive electronic media that allow the spectator to enter the image, to be in the image space. Thereby deconstructivist architecture represented by the famous group Coop Himmelblau takes a further step, also into research of new interface technologies. Examples of first rank media artists show how the imaginary virtual cyberspace and dataspace, the observer and the built real space can interact.
